comments:
build i0527-1300

I had org.eclipse.core.runtime in my workspace and I tried to export it.

- File -> Export
- Deployable Plug-ins and Fragments
- Archive File (runtime.zip)
- Include Source Code

I got a dialog "Error Occurred" with the "Details" button greyed out. When I
checked my log file, I found the following stack trace.

!SESSION 2005-06-01 14:10:40.568 -----------------------------------------------

fyi: not including source makes the export work ok

Did some more investigation. I have the Core Tools loaded in my workspace and it
is on the Tools plug-in that the NPE is failing. It is trying to replace
"qualifer" in the version (1.0.2.qualifier) with something real.

So I removed the Tools projects from my list of plug-ins in my launch config as
well as from my target platform in my target and tried again but I got the same
result. (am running with "clean config each launch")

An "ss" in the console shows me that the tools plug-in is not found by the
system, but we are still trying to process it.

Huh?
The patch for bug #97364 is already adressing this.

Created an attachment (id=22235)
Patch PDEState

This patch includes the patch for bug #97364, as I refactored the code.
DJ please review.
